config.enable-auto-deposit.name: Enable Auto-Deposit
config.enable-auto-deposit.tooltip: If true, items are automatically sucked from your inventory when you get close.
config.auto-deposit-range.name: Auto-Deposit Range
config.auto-deposit-range.tooltip: How many tiles away you can be for auto-deposit to work.
config.cooldown.name: Cooldown (Seconds)
config.cooldown.tooltip: Time to wait after closing the menu before Auto-Deposit starts again.
config.allow-resource.name: Allow 'Resource' Items
config.allow-resource.tooltip: If true, allows storing Stone, Clay, Coal, etc. (Category: Resource).
config.allow-trash.name: Allow 'Trash' Items
config.allow-trash.tooltip: If true, allows storing Broken CDs, Driftwood, Soggy Newspaper, etc. (Category: Trash).
